channel.title: PhD on Xiang Li's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in PhD on Xiang Li's Blog

item.title: What I have learnt from PhD career
item.description: It has been a few months since I officially graduated from the PhD program in August this year, I didn’t write the article immediately after school as I wanted to have a more comprehensive review of the past four-year experience from a distance in terms of time.
